features: 7'' Viewing Space, Dual-Sided & 7x Magnifying - This two sided 360° swivel design luxury mirror features 1x & 7x magnifications. 1x (full face view) and 7x (to see every detail up close).
Concave Lens - Creates the magnification side. For clear, undistorted view, look into the mirror at 10 inches or closer. (See Maximum Distance Recommended Guide)

13'' Extending Arm - The extension arm allows you to pull the mirror out when you need it & push back against the wall after use. This creates a seamless elevated look to any bathroom or vanity décor.
Wall Mounted – Easily mounts to your wall. Great for keeping one extra item off your countertops to create extra space. Mounting hardware included.

US-based Customer Service lets you buy with confidence. Ovente warranties that the product shall be free from defects in material and workmanship under normal use and conditions, for 1 year from the original purchase date.
body.description: This wall mounted makeup mirror can be great for many décor, including vintage, Victorian, Hollywood, medical, or anything that involves beauty and self-care. This bathroom mirror is a classy addition for bathroom, bedroom, grooming, shaving and vanity needs.You can pull or flex the swinging extension to many angles. This vanity makeup mirror gives a chic modern look for any master bath and it is hands free for any home, hotel, dental, and shower needs. Having an attached strong wall mounting mirror is great for maintaining a clean space, by keeping one more item off the countertop. This cute wall mountable magnified looking glass allows you to see up close so you can absolutely see your eyebrow and facial hair, much more clearly. It is sure to bring an influx of positive high end energy to any room for everyone, including girls, boys and kids. Its ability to magnify, show off your accessories and continue a salon & spa experience at home makes this a consumer preferred product.Ovente’s MNLFW Series Wall Mount Cosmetic Makeup Mirror is available in: 3 Deluxe Finishes: Antique Bronze, Nickel Brushed and Polished Chrome 2 Size Offer(s): 7 inch and 9 inch2 Magnification Offer(s): 1x7x and 1x10x

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Consumer Preferred Features 180 Degree Extendable Arm This wall mounted mirror has an extending arm that pulls and pushes back against the wall. It creates a luxurious lit experience while folding towards you as needed and away after use 360 Degree Swivel Rotation The mirror adjusts to any position as needed - features a safe rotation to any angle. Concave Lens Due to the concave lens, try looking 10 inches away or closer for a distortion free view. This means the reflection will not stretch or shrink when in view at the recommended distance or closer. Dual Sided Magnification 1x Side - for normal viewing; makeup application. 7x Magnification - try looking about 10 inches away or closer for best results, this works best for putting on eyeliner, mascara and plucking eyebrows.

7 Inch Antique Bronze Non Lit Wallmount Mirror 7 Inch Antique Bronze Lit Wallmount Mirror 8.5 Inch Oil Rubbed Bronze Lit Wallmount Mirror 7 Inch Polished Chrome Lit Wallmount Mirror 7 Inch Polished Chrome Lit Multi-Use Mirror 7.5 Inch Polished Chrome Lit Wallmount Mirror Ovente Series MNLFW MFW MPWD MSWA MFM MLW Switch Not Lit On/Off Rotary Dimmer Rotary Dimmer Touch Rotary Dimmer Lighting Options No LED Cool, White LED Dimmable LED Dimmable LED 3 Tone LED Dimmable LED & Acrylic Edge Magnification Options 1X/7X and 1X/10X 1X/7X and 1X/10X 1X/7X 7X 1X/5X and 1X/8X 1X/7X and 1X/10X Color Options Nickel Brushed, Polished Chrome and Antique Bronze Nickel Brushed, Polished Chrome, Antique Bronze Nickel Brushed, Polished Chrome, Antique Brass and Oil Rubbed Bronze Polished Chrome Nickel Brushed and Polished Chrome Nickel Brushed, Polished Chrome, Antique Brass Size Options 7.0 inch and 9.0 inch 7.0 inch and 9.6 inch 8.5 inch 7.0 inch 7.0 inch and 8.5 inch 7.5 inch and 9.5 inch Battery (Not Included) - Battery No Batteries No Batteries 4X AAA 4X AA Adapter and Cord (Included) - - We recommend professional installation for your safety and convenience AC Adapter/Cord Batteries Only 2 Port USB Additional Features - - Hardwired Installation to your light switch! - Multi - Use Charge your phone while using with 2 Port USB Wall Mounted ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Wall- Mount, Handheld and Table Top ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great makeup mirror
reviews.reviewText: Sleek design, easy to install, awesome magnification, well made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love that this mirror! Is movable and the finish is brushed nickel like all of my other fixtures. It moves in and out and left to right The mirror flips from regular to magnification easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Big Heavy mirror
reviews.reviewText: First, this is a great mirror. Optics are good and it is really big! But - it is really big, and heavy. I'm returning it because I don't have a stud to attach it to, and it would pull out of dry-wall with use. In a small bathroom like mine, I am limited in where I can place a mirror like this so the size becomes a problem. These are issues with my space, not with the mirror itself. Just be aware that 9" is really big and makes it heavy. I will probably opt for the 7" size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Large mirror, great magnification.
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install, mirror is a very large 9" in diameter. My wife loves it!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this mirror
reviews.reviewText: I cannot live without some magnifying mirror for makeup. This installed easily and is very sturdy.Wherever I go it will come with.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Well built product at an affordable price. Arrived on time and with no damage

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: When normal companies even include batteries with most products. this firm does not even give a screw and molly-bolt -- so you are ready to install -- BUT NO, go out and get a screw and molly-bolt that might cost the manufacturer 1 cent and you need to get the right size. Then on installing, if you plan to put it near the light-switch, make sure you have left room for the plate, not just the screw holes themselves!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice item
reviews.reviewText: I needed a hands free mirror for colostomy care. This is a perfect device. Very easy to install with the two screws and bracket included. Once installed it swings away flush with the wall and out of the way. It is attractive and an excellent choice. The 10 times magnification side is too much for my needs but certainly helpful for others.
